links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (12,-20)
formula: a(n) =125*10^(n-2)-2^(n-2) =a(n-1)*10+2^n - _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 06 2000G.f.: 1/(1-12*x+20*x^2) [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 27 2009, corrected by R. J. Mathar, Mar 14 2011
prog: (Sage) [lucas_number1(n,12,20) for n in xrange(1, 18)]# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 27 2009](Sage) [(10^n - 2^n)/8 for n in xrange(1,19)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 05 2009](MAGMA) [2^n*(5^(n+1)-1)/4: n in [0..20]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Oct 09 2011(PARI) Vec(1/((1-2*x)*(1-10*x))+O(x^99)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 23 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
